nodes.text: The CP-7 Anti-Cover Probe was a model of small probe droid used by the Chiss spy Maki'voro, a lieutenant of the spymaster known as the Shroud during the Galactic War. One of a number of probe models that Maki'voro used, the CP-7 probe was designed to force enemies out of cover.

CP-7 Anti-Cover Probes appear as enemies in the missions "Dark Design" and "All the Pieces," which are the Republic and Imperial versions of a mission in the macrobinoculars mission in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
